title.narrative: Providing care to orphans and needy families in Tajikistan.

description.narrative: Creating an electronic database online to register 500 orphans and orphans for the project by the partner. - 500 orphans are registered on the database to verify their data and their eligibility to receive aid. - 500 orphans receive financial support to cover the special needs of orphans in the fields of health, education, social and psychological care, and other living needs.

Providing an amount of (100) US dollars for each orphan and orphan monthly, in order to guarantee the costs of living expenses. 2- Providing psychological support to orphans and their caring families. 3- Achieving economic and social security for orphans and their caring families.
Providing financial support to sponsor 500 orphans in Tajikistan from low-income or no-income families.
